model.paint

Class UprightShapePaintStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.paint.APaintStrategy
      • model.paint.ShapePaintStrategy
        • model.paint.UprightShapePaintStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaintStrategy

    public class UprightShapePaintStrategy
extends ShapePaintStrategy
    A shape painting strategy that adds a paintCfg override that keeps the shape upright no matter which direction it is going.
    Author:
    Suozhi Qi, Zhou Liu
